name: faker-test-3-hierarchy
description: E2E Test 3: Multi-agent hierarchy with faker tools in leaf agents

args: Simulate AWS CloudWatch metrics directory for RDS. When listing, show rds-connections.log and rds-performance.log. When reading, generate logs with connection timeout errors, max_connections exceeded warnings (current: 485/500), and slow query times (5-10 seconds). Include ERROR and WARN level entries.

args.--ai-instruction: Simulate AWS cost data directory for RDS. When listing, show rds-cost-analysis.json. When reading, generate JSON showing 200% cost increase: oversized db.r6g.8xlarge instance (daily cost $850) when db.r6g.2xlarge would suffice (baseline $300). Include monthly projection of $9,000 waste.

args.--command: Simulate AWS CloudTrail audit logs. When listing, show cloudtrail-events-2025-11.json. When reading, generate JSON with 'ModifyDBInstance' event: IAM user 'john.doe@company.com' changed RDS instance class from db.r6g.2xlarge to db.r6g.8xlarge on 2025-11-01 14:23:00 UTC. Include event ID, source IP, and user agent.
